name: death flame taco
instructions: 1. In a large skillet, cook the ground beef over medium heat until fully browned and cooked through. Drain any excess grease.
2. Return the cooked beef to the skillet and add the taco seasoning. Stir well to coat the beef evenly. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
3. Warm the flour tortillas on a separate skillet or in the microwave for about 15 seconds on each side.
4. To assemble the tacos, divide the seasoned ground beef evenly among the tortillas. Top with diced onions, diced tomatoes, sliced jalapenos, shredded cheddar cheese, and a dollop of sour cream.
5. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
6. Fold the tortillas in half and serve immediately.
description: The Death Flame Taco is a fiery and flavorful dish featuring seasoned ground beef, topped with a combination of diced onions, tomatoes, jalapenos, and cheddar cheese. The addition of sour cream adds a creamy and cooling element to balance out the heat. Served in warm tortillas, this dish promises to satisfy your taco cravings with a spicy twist.
